intro.html:
Workshop: Is Generative AI creative?

Bringing together perspectives from science and philosophy

ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to the workshop on Generative AI and creativity , where we will discuss to what extent modern generative artificial intelligence is creative. We will bring together a diverse group of experts from the sciences and humanities in Trieste from July 3rd-5th, 2025 -- come join us! In addition to the invited and contributed talks and ample time for discussions, we will also have an artistic event that involves some generative AIs -- details to follow soon!

For more information about the themes of the workshop, see our description here.

Applications will soon open. You can apply to participate via the ICTP website. Note that our workshop will be followed by Youth in high dimensions, a workshop on recent progress in the theory of machine learning, high-dimensional statistics, and inference.

Confirmed speakers

The event will be animated by a fantastic set of speakers.

  • ...
  • ...
  • ...
  • ...
  • ...

Organisers

Lorenzo Bardone (SISSA)
Michael Benzaquen (CNRS, Ecole Polytechnique) Sebastian Goldt (SISSA)
Elisa Gremmo (Unipd)
Matteo Marsili (ICTP)
Fabiola Ricci (SISSA)
Gabriele Tomasi (Unipd)

Funding

We thank the following agencies for their generous financial support of the workshop.
